album.title: The Slow Rush
album.author: Tame Impala
album.description: The fourth studio album by Australian musical project Tame Impala, released on 14 February 2020.

album.title: The Miracle
album.author: Queen
album.description: The thirteenth studio album by the British rock band Queen, released on 22 May 1989.

album.title: Sweetener
album.author: Ariana Grande
album.description: The fourth studio album by American singer Ariana Grande. It was released on August 17, 2018.

album.title: Love + Fear
album.author: Marina
album.description: The fourth studio album by Welsh singer Marina Diamandis and her first under the mononym Marina.

album.title: AM
album.author: Arctic Monkeys
album.description: The fifth studio album by English indie rock band Arctic Monkeys.
